 2016-12012016-12-21,  ,  ,  ,  LAB
ActCanada Labour Code
PrecisReappointment of NORMAND RIVARD of Ottawa, Ontario, as a full-time member of the Canada Industrial Relations Board, to hold office during good behaviour for a term of six months plus one day; and be deemed to be employed in the Public Service for the purposes of the Public Service Superannuation Act.
